desc: Welcome to Lone Peak Cabs & Lapidary Arts Studio. We are thrilled to offer you high quality, hand cut Cabochons for both jewelry making and discerning stone collectors. Shop our selection of Tiffany Stone, Iron Buffalo, Turquoise, Variscite, Unique Laced Agates, Ocean Jasper, and more. We are a family based business!

layout.text: Unique, Hand Cut Cabochons. Quality High Grade & Rare Materials. Hand Crafted in our Studio in Utah.
